mapper.insert: insert into staffrepair (sId, sCode, sName, sPwd, sSex, sPhone, sEvaluate) values (#{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{scode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ssex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0)
mapper.update: update staffrepair set sCode = #{scode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sName = #{sname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sPwd = #{spwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sSex = #{ssex,jdbcType=CHAR}, sPhone = #{sphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where sId = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select sId, sCode, sName, sPwd, sSex, sPhone, sEvaluate, stheme from staffrepair
